      This method will decide whether player have power up and if yes, modifying the progress_bar for powerup.

      This method will tick the progress bar that inform player when they are allowed to fire again.

      This method will set the map frame for specific level, assign all important Gameobject to app's constructor.

        Overrides:
        settings in class processing.core.PApplet

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Load all resources such as images that required for the game to run. Initialise the elements such as the player, enemies and map elements. parsing the live, cooldownspeed and map from conf.
        Overrides:
        setup in class processing.core.PApplet

      • keyPressed

        public void keyPressed()
        Receive key pressed signal from the keyboard. This will decide the movement of the wizard or reset the game.
        Overrides:
        keyPressed in class processing.core.PApplet

        public void keyReleased()
        Receive key released signal from the keyboard.
